task.title: Entering Receipts: Time of Payment
task.abstract: Users can execute a batch at the time of payment.

step.cmd: Navigate to the Sales Order tab in the eBusiness application and click the New button.
Enter the Contact, Posting Entity, and Schedule Type. Click Save.
Click the Shopping Cart button and add an item to the cart.

step.info: On the Payment page, select the batch to assign to the Receipt using the Batch lookup.

taskbody.result: Batching is completed at the time of payment.
